EN.@@min: Value must be greater or equals than {min}
EN.@@max: Value must not be greater than {max}
EN.@@minlength: Value must have at least {requiredLength} characters
EN.@@maxlength: Value must not have more than {requiredLength}characters
EN.@@pattern: Value must follow the character pattern '{requiredPattern}'
EN.@@email: Value must be a valid email address
EN.@@numeric_integer: Value must be a numeric integer
EN.@@numeric_decimal_with_expected_precisio: Value must not have more than {expectedPrecision} decimals
EN.@@collection_with_expected_max_size: No more than {expectedMaxSize} elements are required

ES.@@numeric_integer: El valor debe ser un número entero

ES.@@collection_with_expected_max_size: No se requieren más de {expectedMaxSize} elementos

JA.@@min: 値は{min}以上でなければなりません

JA.@@email: 値は有効なメールアドレスでなければなりません

JA.@@collection_with_expected_min_size: 少なくとも{expectedMinSize}個の要素が必要です

JA.@@collection: コレクションが必要です
JA.@@empty: 値は空であってはなりません
JA.@@null: 値はnullであってはなりません
